description: Generates creative ideas and alternatives for a given topic or problem

inputs_schema.topic: The topic or problem to brainstorm about

phases.name: ideate
phases.instructions:
Brainstorm {{ input.count | default('5') }} creative ideas for: {{ input.topic }}

For each idea:
1. Give it a catchy name
2. Brief description (1-2 sentences)
3. Key benefit or unique angle

Be diverse and creative in your approaches.
